org.apache.hadoop.hbase.allocation.group
类 MoveConfImpl

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.hadoop.hbase.allocation.group.MoveConfImpl

public class MoveConfImpl
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used for update regionserver configuration and library

It use two shell script in ${hbase_home}/hbase-webapps/master/ , moveremoteconf.sh and restartserver.sh , make sure you have permission

MoveConfImpl

public MoveConfImpl(java.lang.String path)
Construct method

参数：

方法详细信息

ScpConf

public boolean ScpConf(java.lang.String server,
                       java.lang.String command)
Scp configuration between regionservers

参数：
server - regionserver name ,example "dw83.kgb.sqa.cm4"
command - if command is "get" ,it will get remote regionserver configuration and library to local temp file ; if command is "put", it will put temp configuration and library to remote regionserver.
返回：
true if success ,else false

ImplRegionServer

public boolean ImplRegionServer(java.lang.String server,
                                java.lang.String command)
Start or stop regionserver from master use shell script

参数：
server - regionserver name ,example "dw83.kgb.sqa.cm4"
command - "start" or "stop" ,means start or stop regionserver
返回：
true if success ,else false

DistributeConf

public boolean DistributeConf(java.lang.String server,
                              java.lang.String command)
DistributeConf configuration to regionserver

参数：
server - regionserver name ,example "dw83.kgb.sqa.cm4,60020"
command - if command is "distribute " ,it will distribute hbase-site,xml to remote regionservwer
返回：
true if success ,else false
